distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for pango fixes the following issues:

Security issue fixed:

- CVE-2018-15120: Fixed a denial of service when parsing emoji (bsc#1103877)
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: libpango in Pango 1.40.8 through 1.42.3, as used in hexchat and other products, allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (application crash) or possibly have unspecified other impact via crafted text with invalid Unicode sequences.
notes.title: CVE description

remediations.details: To install this SUSE Security Update use the SUSE recommended installation methods like YaST online_update or "zypper patch".
